heading: mp3 protector steps forward
subheading: fearing that the music recording industry will torpedo mp3 at its first opportunity, a british group declares its intention to protect the technology. by oscar s. cisneros.
author: oscar s. cisneros
text: a british civil liberties organization launched a new initiative monday aimed at protecting the mp3 digital music format as an essential technology of free speech. internet freedom said that the program -- mp3 freedom -- will defend the popular music distribution format against attacks from the recording industry.read wired news' ongoing mp3 coverage
